summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1469, for the improvement of East Denny Way, from Twenty-third Avenue to Thirty-second Avenue, by grading and regrading the same and by constructing wooden curbs, gutters and cross walks and concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 15790 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
